title: Permits a volunteer firefighter who is a paid employee of a political subdivision to earn credit for activities performed during regularly assigned work periods with appropriate municipality
summary: Permits a volunteer firefighter who serves as a paid employee of a political subdivision, to earn credit for activities performed during such individual's regularly assigned work periods if the appropriate municipality has approved in advance such participation.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to service award programs for volunteer firefighters
